languages.text: "Во мне тлела надежда, что Эурак-V еще можно спасти... Однако теперь мой дом потерян. Навсегда".
"I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."
languages.original_text: "Во мне тлела надежда, что Эурак-V еще можно спасти... Однако теперь мой дом потерян. Навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我原本萌生过一丝希望，以为欧拉克五号星站还有救……可现在，我的故乡已经消失了，彻底消失了。”
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: “我原本萌生过一丝希望，以为欧拉克五号星还有救……可现在，我的故乡已经消失了，彻底消失了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'avais bon espoir qu'Eurac-V puisse être sauvée... Mais mon chez-moi a disparu. Pour toujours. »
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: « J'avais bon espoir qu'Eurac-V puisse être sauvée... Mais mon chez-moi a disparu. Pour toujours. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Aún me quedaba una esperanza de salvar Eurac V... pero ahora he perdido mi hogar. Para siempre».
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: «Aún me quedaba una esperanza de salvar Eurac V... pero ahora he perdido mi hogar. Para siempre».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私はユーラック・Vをまだ救えるという一抹の希望を育みましたが…もう故郷は失われたのですね。永遠に」
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: 「私はユーラック・Vをまだ救えるという一抹の希望を育みましたが…もう故郷は失われたのですね。永遠に」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte einen Funken Hoffnung, dass Eurac V noch zu retten ist ... Doch nun ist meine Heimat verloren. Für immer."
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte einen Funken Hoffnung, dass Eurac V noch zu retten ist ... Doch nun ist meine Heimat verloren. Für immer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

languages.text: "İçimde, Eurac V'in kurtulabileceğine dair bir umut kırıntısı vardı... Ancak yuvam yok oldu. Sonsuza dek gitti."
languages.original_text: "I nurtured a spark of hope that Eurac V could still be saved... But now my home is lost. Forever."

traits.locale_text: "İçimde, Eurac V'in kurtulabileceğine dair bir umut kırıntısı vardı... Ancak yuvam yok oldu. Sonsuza dek gitti."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
